plot: A great inventor used to make useful things to everyone on his street, the Street of Tulips, after seeing the happiness of them all, decides that one person's happiness was still missing.
title: Rua das Tulipas
plot_es: A great inventor used to make useful things to everyone on his street, the Street of Tulips, after seeing the happiness of them all, decides that one person's happiness was still missing.
plot_en: A great inventor used to make useful things to everyone on his street, the Street of Tulips, after seeing the happiness of them all, decides that one person's happiness was still missing.
